summary: The diff replaces the old color-sequence game with a match-pairs mini-game, adds celebratory win pop-up animations using the specified assets, and preserves session-based win state via useGameProgress. One requirement is partially/unclearly met around ensuring “Play Again” fully resets all game state in a single action, and there are some unrequested global styling/theme changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: The game supports a “Play Again” flow that fully resets the game state (not just the win flag).
missing_requirements.reason: GameSection’s “Play Again” sets UI state back to idle but does not explicitly reset the mini-game state at that moment (it relies on a later Start Game action incrementing resetTrigger). The diff does not show a direct game reset on Play Again (e.g., incrementing resetTrigger or calling resetGame) to guarantee a full state reset immediately upon Play Again.

hallucinated_features.description: Global Valentine theme palette/typography changes applied in index.css (romantic OKLCH palette, font changes, gradients, shadows).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on revamping the mini-game and adding win pop-up animations/rewards behavior; it does not request a global theme/palette/typography overhaul.
